## useToggle() function

Use an either-or value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useToggle<L, R>(left: L, right: R, options?: UseToggleOptions<L, R>): UseToggleResult<L, R>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | L | One chooseable value. |
|  right | R | The other chooseable value. |
|  options | [UseToggleOptions](./hooks.usetoggleoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;L, R&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

[UseToggleResult](./hooks.usetoggleresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;L, R&gt;

An either-or value, and functions to update it.
